thread.title: EXPAL Naval Systems at the 2015 DSEi Show
thread.title_full: EXPAL Naval Systems at the 2015 DSEi Show

title: EXPAL Naval Systems at the 2015 DSEi Show
text:
EXPAL Naval Systems at the 2015 DSEi Show Monday, September 14, 2015 by EXPAL Print Email 
EXPAL is exhibiting at this year's Defence and Security Equipment International (DESi) event, which will bring together the latest technological updates of the sector. 
DSEI is one of the most important international exhibitions for security and defence, and it will take place in London from the 15-18 September. 
EXPAL will exhibit in DSEI its latest naval products and services proposals divided in its four main areas of activities: Arms systems - ammunition and energetic products Applications and technological systems Maintenance services and integrated logistic support for military vehicles Aeronautic systems and demilitarisation and EOD services Follow Us:
